about_the_game:
This Downloadable Content Pack includes the highly detailed Conrail - EMD SD70MAC model for use in the Trainz Simulator franchise games.

Features Include:

Night Lighting
Ditch Lights
Auto Running Numbers
Fan Animation
Custom Cab
Animated Wipers
detailed_description:

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 11.6
  • Processor: Intel i5 2Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555 with 1GB VRAM supporting OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
